page.title: 05Food and Drink.
page.content: In Chesham there are quite a few places to buy food.There is Sainsburys,Bejams, Waitrose and many other places.Take- away food is cheap and popular.Much food is sold in tins,packages and cartons. Frozen food,fresh fruit and fresh food is available.There are a few Turkey farms,Trout farms and Mushroom farms in our block. We made a survey to find out people's favourite food in our form.The most popular food was burgers,followed by beef.The most unusual food was haggis and pheasant.The most popular drink was Quatro which is a fizzy,mixed fruit drink,then Coke.The most unusual drinks were sherry and lager.
